name: Evil Moon Killer
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project called Evil Moon Killer.

Modifications:

1) Added a New Level

2) Added a Disclaimer screen when the game finishes.

3) Added new scripts to add new functionalities (Rotation, collider ignore, player, live counter, etc.

4) Added a new score to show the current player lives.

5) Added new enemies with full images and sounds.

6) Added a Bezel recreating an old arcade machine.

7) Added new pieces of music and SFX.

8) Added new backgrounds and VFX.

9) Changed the UI to be similar to X-Wing UI.

10) Added player guide explaining how works the game.

11) Added retry level button and function.

12) Another small stuff :)

Credits:

Created by Carles Arasil
